channel.title: WoW Hoster Needed!
channel.description:
I was wondering If anyone has a good computer and Could host my World of Warcraft Server for me. [b]Note: This is only for people taking a break from RS![/b]
[b]MSN:[/b] po9002003@hotmail.com [b]AIM:[/b] dr25oilers

item.title: WoW Hoster Needed!
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:167524”]I bought a dedicated server from dell about 3 months ago but it is only hosting my website… It is a very powerful machine and i need a use for it… so i think it would be fine for a world of warcraft server.

Spec:

32GB ECC DDR2-667 SDRAM
2 Quad-Core AMD OpteronTM 2300 Series processors
1TB Storage[/quote]

Thread necromancer.

Read full topic

item.title: WoW Hoster Needed!
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

[quote=“dococ, post:1, topic:49502”]I was wondering If anyone has a good computer and Could host my World of Warcraft Server for me.
Note: This is only for people taking a break from RS!

MSN: po9002003@hotmail.com
AIM: dr25oilers[/quote]
Meh I can do it but i’m gonna have to reformat my computer before I can. Also I won’t have time to fiddle with it because I’m usually playing cs 1.6 cause of my clan being in cal. But of course I shouldn’t have to do anything cause we would use a sql database that you can login to.
